title: GetSignature (Method)
text:
METHOD GetSignature
Returns the signature of the function, consisting of the type of the
result, the number of arguments, and type of each argument.
Note that the type
SMC_GVar_Type
.T_OTHER can be used
for the return type and for the argument types.  This means
that an arbitrary type may be used (T_BOOL, T_LREAL, or T_STRING),
and that it must be the same type for all uses of T_OTHER in this
signature.

rows.Name: resultType
rows.Comment: The type of the result of the function.

rows: The number of arguments the function accepts.

An array ofnNumArgumentselements, defining the type of
each argument.
